Set the default status of alerts

1 Click the Configuration Parameters button .

Or, on the Template menu, click Configuration Parameters and then Preferences.

2 Select the Alerts ON by default check box.

3 Click Close.

Alerts are triggered when the data for a real-time variable is outside a predefined range. Configure variable properties.) Alert values appear outlined in red on flowsheets and highlighted in red on the Vital Signs bar. Users can turn alerts on and off during a session. The default setting determines the status at the start of a session.

Notes: Alerts in CareSuite are visible not audible. Users must also attend to alert warnings from devices when working with patients.
